column5: are live minows allowed on lotw for bait... targeting walleye and small mouth bass from kenora any suggetions first weeek in july...
Live minnows are definately allowed for bait on LOTW's. However, you of course can not bring minnows across the border. You'll need to purchase them at a bait dealer in your area.
yes i willl purchase minows in kenora.. we are not allowed to use live minnows in sask.. so none available here atall... ive always used frozen minnows..
